title: Steps Monster Watch Face
summary: In this watch face lives monsters that want your steps, do you like know them?

descriptionHTML:
This Android Wear watchface is a interactive and digital face with funny monsters and most relevant information, these changes according you walk and you achieve your goal steps


Look what makes

► Exclusive design for square and rounds screens.

► This watch face alerts you when you let your phone far of you, in this way you don't forget it.

► Interactive watchface, access to the improved app launcher for open more easy any app and open the android wear settings from his shortcut, this watchface is like an android wear launcher.

► Looks your smartwatch different all days, combine the colors or the monster type and make your favorite style.

► Steps counter, track your daily steps and set your goal for make healthy lifestyle.

► The monster changes when you achieve the 50% or 100% of your steps goal

► You can see at a galance the battery of your phone and the battery of your smartwatch.

► Also shows you the full date and time.

Visit our blog to know more of free Android Wear watch faces and review the full article of this watch face [Spanish]:

http://samsoft.es/Blog/watch-face-deep-blue-android-wear/

Features:

★ Improved app launcher, to open tap on center of the watchface
★ Android Wear settings shortcut,tap on gear button
★ Step counter with configurable steps goal
★ Screen timeout control
★ Disconnection alert when your mobile is far of you
★ Exclusive design for squares and rounds screens
★ Customize the monster and details
★ Customize the notifications cards style
★ Low battery drain

Compatibility

ALL devices with Android Wear, like:

-Huawei watch
-Moto 360
-LG watch R
-Sony SmartWatch
-Asus ZenWatch
-....

NOT with:

-Other OS different of Android Wear

FAQ:

1.-Check that the phone is connected to the smartwatch.
2.-Install the Watch Face.
3.-Wait two minutes until a notification appears with the installation on your smartwatch
4.-If it not appears then you must open Android Wear and run resync apps
5.-If the notification appears, you must press on it or long press on the screen for you take the watch faces list for select it.
6.-Enjoy it!!!

Other free Android Wear watchfaces on:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7925815075249357158


For any suggestion or problem contact us on:

contacto@samsoft.es

See you soon, regards.
